code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Dashboard=()=>{const[analyticsData,setAnalyticsData]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('/api/instagram/analytics');setAnalyticsData(response.data);setLoading(false);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching analytics data:',error);setError('Failed to fetch analytics data.');setLoading(false);}};fetchData();},[]);if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading analytics..."});}if(error){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:error});}if(!analyticsData||analyticsData.length===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Instagram Analytics Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No Instagram data available. Please link your Instagram account."})]});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Instagram Analytics Dashboard"}),analyticsData.map((mediaAnalytics,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"analytics-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Media ",index+1," Analytics"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Engagement: ",mediaAnalytics.engagement]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Impressions: ",mediaAnalytics.impressions]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Reach: ",mediaAnalytics.reach]})]},index))]});};export default Dashboard;
